project.name: Lemonade
project.description: An on-chain toolkit for creating events and managing communities
project.longDescription: Lemonade is a comprehensive platform for organizing and managing events on MegaETH. It provides tools for event creation, ticket sales, and community engagement, with direct integration for MEGA wallet payments and rewards.

features.title: Event Creation
features.description: Launch and manage events with customizable settings and ticketing options.

features.title: MEGA Wallet Integration
features.description: Direct ticket revenue to your MEGA wallet for seamless on-chain payments.

features.title: Reward System
features.description: Set up and manage rewards for event participants and community members.

features.title: Community Management
features.description: Tools for engaging and growing your community through events.

project.currentStatus: Live on MegaETH with full event management and reward system functionality.

steps.title: Launch an Event
steps.content:
Start by visiting the MegaETH space on Lemonade to create your event. You can customize various aspects of your event including:

• Event name and description
• Date and time
• Location (physical or virtual)
• Ticket types and pricing
• Capacity and availability

steps.title: Set Up Payment Integration
steps.content:
Configure your event's payment settings to receive ticket revenue directly to your MEGA wallet:

• Connect your MEGA wallet
• Set up ticket pricing
• Choose payment options
• Review transaction settings

steps.title: Set Up Event Rewards
steps.content:
Create and manage rewards for your event participants:

• Define reward types and criteria
• Set up distribution rules
• Configure reward amounts
• Specify eligibility requirements
